overview: Originally released last August, Corey Taylor (Slipknot) leads Stone Sour with the best Hard Rock release of 2006 called Come What(ever) May. In June 2007 they re-release the disk with 6 bonus tracks and a DVD. This special edition package delivers most of what Stonesour stands for: intensity, drama, emotion, color, darkness, melodies, anger, honesty, and drive. Featuring hits like "Through Glass" and "Sillyworld," this package also includes six bonus tracks and DVD footage of a live performance in Moscow (Amazon.com)
title: Stone Sour: Live in Moscow
